title.narrative: PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for MP Health sector support

description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0053 for MP Health sector support) is a component of Madhya Pradesh Health sector reform programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £21,999,995. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Basic health care, Basic nutrition, Reproductive health care. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services, PwC, WaterAid. The start date is 01-05-2007 and the end date is 31-12-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
